attributes.review: Hola chicos Im here to tell y’all que este app no work it’s a waste of time. Quando abrí este app el pelos de elote appeared on  my screen i was very scared when I saw it that i couldn’t sleep for the rest of the month. I was so scared I had to take out my pink whinny the Pooh that was buried in a box in my basement. Please don’t get this app you will have to take therapy for a while.  Bc you will be traumatized for the rest of your life

attributes.review: don’t know how a phone app can even manage this. opened the app for 30 seconds and was met with a violent flash on the screen followed by ringing in my ears.
